name: @sullux/fp-light
description: A lightweight library to support functional programming in javascript.

scripts.build: yarn test && (rm -rf dist || 0) && mkdir dist && cp lib/*.js dist && rm -f ./dist/*.test.js && cp README.md dist/ && node ./scripts/package.js
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cd dist && npm publish --access public

author: Charles Sullivan <sullux@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Sullux)
